entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 07:37 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 07:37 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 07:37 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
